name: Them: companions
description:
Participation for the Miracle game jam 2020

"A love letter" to pets, companions.

Unconventional and personal game , to fit the theme "A love letter" I made an exploration game about pets, or companions, and how their love help us when we are in a dark place, mostly mentally. 

All assets made by Illien Alizée (Halfondarr)
